memberdef.name: minimizer

detaileddescription.para:
Wrapper for GSl minimizer (minimization in 1D)
a
left bound of interval
m
initial guess of parameter
b
right bound of interval
cost
cost function (to be minimized)
max_iter
maximal number iterations
